description: Assesses qualitative factors such as management, industry conditions, economic outlook, and underwriting standards for SNC evaluation, based on Comptroller's Handbook and SNC Program Review insights.

parameters.name: guideline_underwriting_standards
parameters.defaultValue: Sound underwriting provides protections. Weakened underwriting increases credit risk.

parameters.name: guideline_management_competency
parameters.defaultValue: Assess ability to guide entity, exploit opportunities, execute plans, react to market changes.

parameters.name: borrower_management_assessment_str
parameters.description: Assessment of the borrower's management team, their experience, track record, and strategic planning capabilities.

parameters.name: borrower_industry_str
parameters.description: The primary industry in which the borrower operates.

parameters.name: industry_outlook_str
parameters.description: Specific outlook for the borrower's industry, including competitive landscape and cyclicality.

parameters.name: snc_review_focus_industries_str
parameters.description: JSON string listing current SNC focus industries and their specific concerns (from SNC Program Review).

parameters.name: economic_conditions_str
parameters.description: Current overall economic conditions and outlook relevant to the borrower.

parameters.name: underwriting_elements_summary_str
parameters.description: Summary of key underwriting elements of the loan (e.g., covenants, amortization, reporting requirements).

parameters.name: company_business_model_strength_str
parameters.description: Assessment of the company's business model strength and sustainability.

parameters.name: company_competitive_advantages_str
parameters.description: Description of the company's competitive advantages.
